metadata.dcterms:title: Canadiana (CIHM) Collection - Metadata Records
metadata.dcterms:creator: University of Alberta Libraries
metadata.dcterms:description: This set contains records for 75,574 CIHM microfilmed titles digitized in 2013 through a partnership between Canadiana.org, University of Alberta Libraries, the Canadian Research Knowledge Network (CRKN) and Internet Archive. Format: MARC
metadata.dcterms:subject: history
